insert into t_lsc_vendor (c_name, c_vclass, c_addr, c_tele, c_fax, c_zip, c_gcode, c_corporation, c_contacter, c_mphone, c_sale, c_bank, c_bacc, c_blpic, c_cpic, i_status, c_comment) values (#{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cVclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cGcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBacc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBlpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_lsc_vendor set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_vclass = #{cVclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_addr = #{cAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_tele = #{cTele,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_fax = #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_zip = #{cZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_gcode = #{cGcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_corporation = #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_contacter = #{cContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_mphone = #{cMphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_sale = #{cSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_bank = #{cBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_bacc = #{cBacc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_blpic = #{cBlpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_cpic = #{cCpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, c_comment = #{cComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
